  • Field Details

    • jsonHandler

      public JsonHandler jsonHandler

  • Constructor Details

    • MessageHandler

      public MessageHandler()
      The MessageHandler function is responsible for handling the messages that are sent to the server. It takes in a message and then parses it into a JSONObject, which is then used to determine what type of message was sent. Depending on what type of message was received, different actions will be taken by the MessageHandler function.

  • Method Details

    • CreateStartGameMessage

      public void CreateStartGameMessage(String tilesInCapital, String hostNickName, int playerIndex, int numOfPlayers)
      The CreateStartGameMessage function creates a JSON message that is sent to all players in the game. The message contains information about the tiles in each player's capital, as well as other information such as which player has which index and how many players are playing. This function is only called by the serverHost, who sends this message to all clients at the start of a new game.
      Parameters:
      tilesInCapital - Create a jsonarray of the tiles that are in the capital
      hostNickName - Identify the player who is hosting the game
      playerIndex - Determine the player's index in the game
      numOfPlayers - Indicate how many players are in the game

    • CreateTryAgainMessage

      public void CreateTryAgainMessage(String destination, int prevScore, String action, String hostNickName)
      The CreateTryAgainMessage function creates a message that is sent to the client when they have lost. The message contains information about their previous score, and the action that was performed.
      Parameters:
      destination - Specify the destination of the message
      prevScore - Send the previous score to the client
      action - Determine if the player is trying to connect or disconnect
      hostNickName - Set the source of the message

    • CreateSuccessMessage

      public void CreateSuccessMessage(String destination, int newScore, String action, String newCurrentTiles, String hostNickName)
      The CreateSuccessMessage function is used to create a success message.
      Parameters:
      destination - Specify the destination of the message
      newScore - Update the score of the player who played a word
      action - Determine what action the client is performing
      newCurrentTiles - Update the client's current tiles
      hostNickName - Identify the host of the game

    • CreateSucceededChallengeYouMessage

      public void CreateSucceededChallengeYouMessage(String hostNickName, String prevScore)
      The CreateSucceededChallengeYouMessage function creates a message that is sent to the client when they have successfully challenged another player.
      Parameters:
      hostNickName - Identify the host of the game
      prevScore - Store the previous score of the host

    • CreateUpdateBoardMessage

      public void CreateUpdateBoardMessage(String board, String hostNickName)
      The CreateUpdateBoardMessage function creates a message that updates the board.
      Parameters:
      board - Set the board in the json message
      hostNickName - Identify the host of the game

    • CreateTryPlaceWordMessage

      public void CreateTryPlaceWordMessage(String source, String destination, String word, int prevScore, int row, int column, boolean vertical, String currentTiles, String socketSource)
      The CreateTryPlaceWordMessage function creates a message that is sent to the server when a player tries to place a word on the board. The function takes in several parameters, including:
      Parameters:
      source - Indicate the source of the message
      destination - Determine where the message is going
      word - Add the word to the message
      prevScore - Check if the score of the word is higher than the previous score
      row - Specify the row where the word will be placed
      column - Specify the column that the word will be placed in
      vertical - Determine if the word is placed vertically or horizontally public void createtryplacewordmessage(string source, string destination, string word, int prevscore, int row, int column){ this
      currentTiles - Send the tiles that are currently on the board to the server
      socketSource - Determine if the message is coming from a socket or not

    • CreateChallengeMessage

      public void CreateChallengeMessage(String socketSource, String prevBoard)
      The CreateChallengeMessage function creates a challenge message.
      Parameters:
      socketSource - Identify the socket that sent the message
      prevBoard - Send the board to the opponent

    • CreateMessageToGameServer

      public void CreateMessageToGameServer(String message, String socketSource)
      The CreateMessageToGameServer function creates a message to be sent to the game server.
      Parameters:
      message - Add a message to the json object
      socketSource - Identify the socket that sent the message

    • createPassTurnMessage

      public void createPassTurnMessage()
      The createPassTurnMessage function creates a message that is sent to the server when the player passes their turn. The function adds a "pass turn" message type to the JSONHandler object's jsonObject variable, which is then used by sendMessage() in order to send this information over TCP/IP.

    • createStopChallengeAlive

      public void createStopChallengeAlive()
      The createStopChallengeAlive function is used to create a JSON message that will be sent to the server. The purpose of this function is to send a message that will stop the challenge alive timer on the server side.

    • createEndGameMessage

      public void createEndGameMessage(String winner)
      The createEndGameMessage function creates a JSON message that is sent to the client when the game ends.
      Parameters:
      winner - Determine the winner of the game

    • updatePrevToCurrent

      public void updatePrevToCurrent()
      The updatePrevToCurrent function updates the previous state of the game to be equal to the current state. This is done by setting all of the values in prevState equal to their corresponding values in currState.

    • createChallengeSuccessMessage

      public void createChallengeSuccessMessage()
      The createChallengeSuccessMessage function creates a JSONObject that contains the message type "challenge success" and adds it to the jsonHandler's list of messages.

    • createNewPlayerJoinedMessage

      public void createNewPlayerJoinedMessage(String nickName)
      The createNewPlayerJoinedMessage function creates a new JSON message that is sent to the server when a new player joins the game.
      Parameters:
      nickName - Add the nickname of the player that joined to the message
